Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor\(navigation\): centralize bottom navigation at app level

Implement Clean Architecture pattern by moving navigation bar to app-level
as single source of truth. This eliminates duplication and improves
maintainability.

**Changes:**
- Move AppBottomNavigation to App.kt \(centralized\)
- Remove duplicate navigation bars from Home, Progress, Settings screens
- Simplify screen composables to only render content
- Update navigators with proper back stack management
- Fix Settings screen navigation \(was broken with empty callbacks\)

**Benefits:**
- Single source of truth for navigation state
- No recreation of nav bar on screen transitions
- Decoupled features \(SOLID principles\)
- Smoother animations and better performance
- Scalable for adding new features

**Architecture:**
- App level: Handles cross-feature navigation and persistent UI
- Feature level: Handles feature-specific content only
- Follows Clean Architecture dependency rule

Fixes navigation consistency issues across all three main screens.

EOF
